**Background (Sage):** Aldric spent decades studying in the great library of Candlekeeps, obsessed with recovering fragments of a lost treatise on primordial magic. His insatiable curiosity has finally drawn him out into the world to seek the forgotten knowledge that exists beyond the archives.

**Why This Character:** A scholar-wizard driven by intellectual hunger, perfect for exploring ancient libraries, deciphering mysteries, and uncovering lost secrets. His moderate CON and INT focus makes him a classic lore-keeper.
